POST:

enableComponents

protected void enableComponents()
Sets the enable/disable state of all components in the controller's view. A component should be enabled only if the user is currently allowed to interact with that component.
PRE:
None
POST:
The enable/disable state of all components in the controller's view have been set appropriately.

Overrides:
enableComponents in class Controller
